game.name: Burned Land
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Burned Land is a 4x game in which you will take control of a nascent human race and try to avoid its extinction. Build, explore, conquer until you are worthy of gods. Then confront their anger.
